description: Create an open door team membership.

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.validation: Allowed values: brokers, truckers, customers. Server validates organization_type as Broker, Trucker, or Customer.

permissions: Admins can create open door team memberships. Non-admins can create only if they are an admin membership of the organization or its broker.
side_effects: Creates an open door team membership.
validation_notes: --membership, --organization-type, and --organization-id are required. organization_type must be Broker, Trucker, or Customer. Membership must be related to the organization or its broker.
